sections.PROJECT:
Title : GSM based automatic energy meter reading system 
Duration : Semester (6months) 
Platform : Windows XP 
Packages Used : Keil Vision v3 and Proteus Design 
Environment : Embedded Systems 
Team Size : 4 
 
 
Application Overview: 
 
This application is used to give the reading of electricity used by the consumer and 
sends the message through GSM modem to his/her mobile and the following message is 
also sent to the electrical department
